remarks: When ` A ` is a subclass of ` On ` , ` F ` is a strictly monotone ordinal functions, and it is also complete (it is an isomorphism onto all of ` A ` ).  The proof avoids ~ ax-rep (the second statement is trivial under ~ ax-rep ).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)
statement:
oismo.1 $e |- F = OrdIso ( _E , A ) $.
oismo $p |- ( A C_ On -> ( Smo F /\ ran F = A ) ) $.
